                                                                                                                                       java.lang.Integer branchId)
        Gets the list of counters present in the branch
        Parameters:
        branchId - branch identifier
        Returns:
        list of counters present in the branch
        Throws:

      • getBranchCounter

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Counter> getBranchCounter(@PathVariable(value="id")

                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer counterId)
        Gets a particular counter present in the branch
        Parameters:
        branchId - branch identifier
        counterId - counter identifier
        Returns:
        counter with the id passed
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when branch does not exist or counter with passed id is not present in branch
